result.title: prob E from Battle #1
result.content:
Salam

rahe hale soal e E ro nesfesho minevisam baghiasho agar moshkeli dashtin begin minevisam Codam am hast khub zadam ;-)

1- in n ta baze ro mishe too 2*n khune y avval e moghtasat ja dad

2- hala ma ye joori beyne in 2*n ta (shoroo va payan e baze ha) yal jahat dar vasl mikonim va dar akhar Topological Sort mikonim va javab ra bedast miarim

hala khudetoon ro nahve y vasl kardane yal ha fekr konid (rahe tamiz dare)

SaDDaS Code : http://paste.ubuntu.com/11719237/
